#summary A brief guide for Map-makers
#labels Phase-Implementation
= Introduction =

This document contains information helpful for map-makers.

=== Sample `*`.gsc File ===
New maps, and existing maps that are updated, should follow this [http://code.google.com/p/reign-of-the-undead/source/browse/trunk/map_src/contrib/test_map/raw/maps/mp/mp_surv_testmap.gsc example] file for their script files.  Doing so will prevent the *very* common precache errors and help with debugging.
